Description: Large fragment of a quilted hat, main textile a - blue and white cotton with small checks, below this cotton wadding , lining cum back layer. b - coarse plain linen. Hat constructed with a long strip forming sides of the crown and triangular pieces forming top of the crown. Quilting and main constructional sewing in a dark blue wool thread. Sewn eyelets, especially towards apex of triangles in a lighter blue wool thread.
Acquisition name: Division of Finds: Egyptian Antiquities Organisation
